about_the_game:
『Shadow of the Ninja - Reborn　Digital Soundtrack』

A masterpiece of NINJA action game is released for the first time in thirty-five years!
The masterpieces of the gems are back!
All the songs that make the main game exciting are included in full!
Please enjoy the gem sounds.

Playback is possible only with the application.
It is not possible to download songs in MP3 or other audio formats.
Please note.

The full game is required to run this application.

▼Songs
01：A World Deprived of Light (Opening Demo 1st half)
02：Dark Assassins Appear (Opening Demo 2nd half)
03：Stage Start
04：Coastal Defense Line (Stage 1)
05：A Dangerous Enemy Takes Stage (Boss Battle)
06：Stage Cleared
07：Prepare for Mission
08：Underworld (Stage 2)
09：Demon-ruled Skyscraper (Stage 3)
10：Arsenal (Stage 4)
11：Mobile Sky Fortress (Stage 5)
12：Demon's Stronghold (Stage 6)
13：Final Battle - Emperor Garuda (Stage 6 Boss Battle)
14：Time for the End (Stage 6 Boss Battle, Stage 2)
15：Ninjas Living in the Dark (Ending – Staff Roll)
16：Game Over
detailed_description:
『Shadow of the Ninja - Reborn　Digital Soundtrack』

A masterpiece of NINJA action game is released for the first time in thirty-five years!
The masterpieces of the gems are back!
All the songs that make the main game exciting are included in full!
Please enjoy the gem sounds.

Playback is possible only with the application.
It is not possible to download songs in MP3 or other audio formats.
Please note.

The full game is required to run this application.

▼Songs
01：A World Deprived of Light (Opening Demo 1st half)
02：Dark Assassins Appear (Opening Demo 2nd half)
03：Stage Start
04：Coastal Defense Line (Stage 1)
05：A Dangerous Enemy Takes Stage (Boss Battle)
06：Stage Cleared
07：Prepare for Mission
08：Underworld (Stage 2)
09：Demon-ruled Skyscraper (Stage 3)
10：Arsenal (Stage 4)
11：Mobile Sky Fortress (Stage 5)
12：Demon's Stronghold (Stage 6)
13：Final Battle - Emperor Garuda (Stage 6 Boss Battle)
14：Time for the End (Stage 6 Boss Battle, Stage 2)
15：Ninjas Living in the Dark (Ending – Staff Roll)
16：Game Over

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: AMD FX-4350 / Intel® Core™ i3-3210
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R7 260X (2GB VRAM) / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750(2GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A soundtrack application for "KAGE Shadow of the Ninja" is now available!
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
